meanings.definition: The study of pollen and spores.
meanings.sent1: Palynology helps scientists learn about different types of pollen and spores.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use palynology to identify plant species based on pollen samples.
meanings.sent3: The palynology class had a fun field trip to collect pollen samples in the forest.
meanings.sent4: In the world of palynology, each pollen grain is like a tiny puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of palynology lies in its ability to reveal the secrets of ancient plant life.

meanings.definition: The scientific study of pollen grains and spores to understand ancient environments.
meanings.sent1: Palynology is crucial in reconstructing past environments through pollen analysis.
meanings.sent2: Researchers use palynology to paint a picture of the Earth's history through pollen records.
meanings.sent3: The detective in the mystery novel solved the case using his knowledge of palynology.
meanings.sent4: Palynology acts as a time machine, taking us back to the landscapes of ancient times.
meanings.sent5: Through palynology, we can travel back in time and witness the ecosystems of the past.
